name: 史蒂文·布拉德
name_full: 史蒂文·布拉德 Steven Bullard
introduction: Born in Edina, Minnesota, Steven had a love for filmmaking, photography, and music at an early age - making home movies with friends and family, shooting and developing 35mm stills in high school, and forming rock bands to play shows and record albums. He attended Minneapolis Community and Technical College and earned an Associates of Cinematography in 2011. Since then, Steven has collaborated on many different projects and continues to work in the industry. He has hopes of writing and directing his first feature in the coming years.
